welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Amagasaki, a charming city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your visit."

restaurants.name: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店 尼崎西立花店)
restaurants.description: Komeda's Coffee (コメダ珈琲店 尼崎西立花店) is a café located in 尼崎市.

restaurants.name: Gyoza no Ohsho (餃子の王将 尼崎西店)
restaurants.description: Gyoza no Ohsho (餃子の王将 尼崎西店) is a chinese restaurant located in 尼崎市.

restaurants.name: 讃岐うどん 穂乃香
restaurants.description: 讃岐うどん 穂乃香 is a udon restaurant located in 尼崎市.

restaurants.name: Nagomi (和海)
restaurants.description: Nagomi (和海) is a ramen restaurant located in 尼崎市.

restaurants.name: 味楽園
restaurants.description: 味楽園 is a bbq joint located in 尼崎市.
restaurants.address: 南竹谷町2-1, 尼崎市, 兵庫県, 660-0875

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Itami Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Itami Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'ITM Free WiFi' and accepting the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kobe Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
